definition: the momentary juggling of a batted or thrown baseball, to make a mess of, destroy or ruin
details:
noun
- the momentary juggling of a batted or thrown baseball
= example: the momentary juggling of a batted or thrown baseball
verb
- to make a mess of, destroy or ruin
= example: to make a mess of, destroy or ruin
= synonyms: bungle, flub, botch, fumble, muff, fluff, blow, spoil, screw up, mess up, bumble, muck up, mishandle, bodge, botch up, ball up, bollix, bollix up, bollocks, bollocks up, louse up, foul up
